title: Fate

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose three of the following each night. A random one of the chosen three will be announced at the start of the next day and then take effect as abilities resolve the next night.
> - All other players lose all defense.
> - All other players' targets will be randomized.
> - All other players' roles will be shuffled.
> - All other players may use up to three abilities the next night.
> - All other players gain the ability to deal one Basic attack.
> - All other players are forced to use their abilities on themselves.
> - All other players have a 25% chance each of being poisoned.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Directly or indirectly cause at least one quarter of all deaths.
